Package org.apache.shardingsphere.infra.rule.builder

Interface RuleBuilder<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of rule configuration
    All Superinterfaces:
    OrderedSPI<T>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DatabaseRuleBuilder<T>, GlobalRuleBuilder<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AuthorityRuleBuilder, BroadcastRuleBuilder, CompatibleEncryptRuleBuilder, EncryptRuleBuilder, GlobalClockRuleBuilder, LoggingRuleBuilder, MaskRuleBuilder, ReadwriteSplittingRuleBuilder, ShadowRuleBuilder, ShardingRuleBuilder, SingleRuleBuilder, SQLFederationRuleBuilder, SQLParserRuleBuilder, SQLTranslatorRuleBuilder, TimestampServiceRuleBuilder, TrafficRuleBuilder, TransactionRuleBuilder
    public interface RuleBuilder<T>
extends OrderedSPI<T>
    Rule builder.
